entries.journal_entry_description: Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find and activate the various miner markers which are located around the burning plains.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the Berken's Flow bridge and activate it.
entries.task02_message_box_text: Another Klegger Corp. bridge that shows the wear of time on its steel frame. This bridge connects the Burning Plains to Berken's Flow.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the temple ruins and activate it.
entries.task04_message_box_text: WARNING: These ruins are closed by order of Milo Mensix. Everyone who spends any time in these ruins seems to lose their mind. Miners who have visited these ruins and returned have reported a very uneasy feeling, like they were being watched. The ruins themselves seem to be that of a great temple of unknown origin.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker near the central volcano bridge and activate it.
entries.task06_message_box_text: Another bridge built by the Klegger Corporation. This bridge leads to the second largest volcano in the region. Although a poor source of resources, the volcano is invaluable as a landmark on an ever-shifting world.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the central portion of the Burning Plains and activate it.
entries.task08_message_box_text: There are only a few points of high elavation in the Burning Plains. When the plains finally are swallowed by the lava, these areas will become important mining islands.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Locate the marker in the northern section of the Burning Plains and activate it.
entries.task10_message_box_text: The surface crust on the Burning Plains is especially thin. This allows lava to nearly bubble through the surface. Most experts agree that, if the area suffers a big enough earthquake, the entire plain will become a sea of lava.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: There are five markers located throughout the Burning Plains to the far north of the Mensix Mining Facility. Surveyor Keslev has asked you to find all five of them and check the information on them.
